name: dsbox.corexdiscrete.corex_discrete.corexdiscrete
description: Return components/latent factors that explain the most multivariate mutual information in the data. For comparison, PCA returns components explaining the most variance in the data.

attributes.name: labels
attributes.description: Label (i.e. highest probability value) of each hidden unit for each sample.  Note, hidden units are binary by default, so label in {0,1}.

attributes.name: p_y_given_x
attributes.description: The distribution of hidden unit activations for each sample.

attributes.name: clusters
attributes.description: Cluster label for each input variable.

attributes.name: alpha
attributes.description: Adjacency matrix between input variables and hidden units (values in [0,1], defining structure of the model).

parameters.name: n_hidden
parameters.description: Number of components or latent factors to use.

parameters.name: dim_hidden
parameters.description: Each hidden unit can take dim_hidden discrete values.

parameters.name: max_iter
parameters.description: Maximum number of iterations taken for the solvers to converge.

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: The seed of the pseudo random number generator to use.

parameters.name: verbose
parameters.description: Set true for verbose output or >1 to get even more verbosity.

methods_available.name: fit
methods_available.description: 'Fit the model according to the given training data.

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: Training vector, where n_samples is the number of samples and n_features is the number of features.

returns.name: Y
returns.description: Returns latent factors/components for each sample. '

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: Training vector, where n_samples is the number of samples and n_features is the number of features.

methods_available.name: fit_transform
methods_available.description: 'Fit model to given training data and transform data according to learned model.

returns.name: Y
returns.description: Returns latent factors/components for each sample.

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: Training vector, where n_samples is the number of samples and n_features is the number of features.
